amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part C of House Report 111-183 to prohibit funds in the bill from going to Global Solar, Arizona, for portable solar charging rechargeable battery systems, and reduce the overall cost of the bill by a commensurate amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 110 - 318 (Roll no. 447).
